mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (me_id, me_pw, me_name, me_birth, me_gender, me_address, me_phone) VALUES (#{user.me_id}, #{user.me_pw}, #{user.me_name}, #{user.me_birth}, #{user.me_gender}, #{user.me_address}, #{user.me_phone});
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET me_pw = #{user.me_pw}, me_name = #{user.me_name}, me_birth = #{user.me_birth}, me_gender = #{user.me_gender}, me_address = #{user.me_address}, me_phone = #{user.me_phone} WHERE me_id = #{user.me_id};
